p: The COX-2 inhibitor screening assay kit was purchased from Beyotime Biotechnology (Shanghai, China). 2,2-Diphenyl-1-pircryhydrazyl (DPPH), 2,2â€²-azinobis-(3-ethylbenzthiazoline-6-sulphonate) (ABTS), and celecoxib were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). L-Ascorbic acid (Vc) was purchased from Aladdin (Shanghai, China). Acetonitrile and formic acid (LC-MS grade) were purchased from Fisher Scientific (Pittsburgh, PA, USA). HPLC grade water was deionized using a Milli-Q ultrapure water system (Merck Millipore, Milford, MA, USA).
